TextEng: Heh. Look at Baram's men cowering over there. Kurth'll have mopped the floor with them in no time.
Text: 헤. 저기 쫄아 있는 바람 부하들 좀 봐. 커스님이 금방 걸레짝 만들어 버릴 거야.

TextEng: Ye're one o' Kurth's, aye? Aye, I think ye are. Good. If Kurth's going to be the true High Captain, he needs all the recruits he can get.
Text: 너 커스님 밑이지? 그렇지? 맞아, 분명 그럴 거야. 좋아. 커스님이 진짜 대선장 되려면 신병이 많아야 하니까.

TextEng: Those curs of Baram's are going to pay for burnin' down our tower, they will!
Text: 바람이 놈의 개같은 자식들이 우리 탑 불태운 대가 톡톡히 치를 거야!

TextEng: There's been hordes of them... creatures in the streets. I thinks Baram's in league with necromancers, summonin' ghouls an' such.
Text: 거리에 그놈들... 괴물이 떼로 나타나더라. 바람이 강령술사랑 짜고 구울 같은 거 불러내는 거 같아.

TextEng: With Kurth dead, we'll... well, we don't know what. Got an army now with nobody to lead it.
Text: 커스님이 돌아가셨으니, 뭐... 어떻게 될지 모르겠어. 이끌 사람 없는 군대만 남았지.

TextEng: Word in the Bloody Hands is that even though Kurth is dead, we ain't disbanding. Someone else is gonna lead us... don't know who, though.
Text: '피묻은 손' 안에서 도는 말로는, 커스님이 돌아가셔도 우린 해산 안 한대. 다른 놈이 이끌 거라는데... 누군지는 모르겠지만.

TextEng: Kurth's dead! I wonder who had the guts to do that...
Text: 커스님이 돌아가셨어! 도대체 누가 감히 그런 짓을...

TextEng: I'm gonna find the fool who killed Kurth and make them pay, I will! Right after that fool o' Baram's over there...
Text: 커스님을 죽인 놈 찾아내서 대가 치르게 해줄 거야, 꼭! 저기 바람이 놈의 멍청이 정리하고 나서...

TextEng: Stand off, ye bloody cur.
Text: 꺼져, 이 개자식아.

TextEng: What're you? One o' Baram's, I expect? Kurth will kill you all, I bet.
Text: 뭐야 넌? 바람 쪽이겠지? 커스님이 너희 전부 죽일 거야, 틀림없어.

TextEng: The Bloody Hands will rule the city soon enough, they will, heh...
Text: '피묻은 손'이 곧 도시를 지배할 거야, 헤...

TextEng: Go on, get out of here. You're not one of Kurth's, which means ye're less than spit to me.
Text: 가, 꺼져. 커스님 밑도 아니면 침만도 못해.

TextEng: Huh. Who are you supposed to be?
Text: 허. 넌 누구야?

TextEng: We've driven Baram an' his men down to the sewers. They should stay there, if they're smart.
Text: 바람이랑 그 부하들을 하수도로 몰아넣었어. 머리가 있으면 거기나 처박혀 있으라고.

TextEng: Baram's men shouldn't even be allowed in here...
Text: 바람 부하들이 여기 들어오게 하면 안 되는데...

TextEng: Get lost.
Text: 꺼져.

TextEng: I'd smash yer face in... but we ain't allowed, in here.
Text: 얼굴 부숴버릴 텐데... 여긴 그러면 안 되거든.

TextEng: I gotta go back to West Harbor soon. Maybe I'll take the short-cut in that hole in the wall by the old tower.
Text: 곧 웨스트 하버로 돌아가야 해. 옛 탑 옆 벽 구멍으로 지름길 가야겠어.

TextEng: Who let you in here?
Text: 누가 너 들여보냈어?

TextEng: If I see you on the streets, ye're dead.
Text: 거리에서 보면, 죽은 목숨이야.

TextEng: Leave me be, fool.
Text: 좀 내버려 둬, 멍청아.
